resources.string:
"Hi, Am Juma

 Programmer | Sofware Developer |Mobile developer
 I'd just say am a tech enthusiast
 Am currently in my final year in campus an curious
 of whatever is gonna happen to us when we get out.
 Well,they do say good preparation saves the day
 and to me that implies whatever i do now determines
 whatever happens next.
 Got proficiencies in a few a languages : Java, C,C++ 
I have also had experiences using Databases such as SQL
 Of late my focus is into mobile development majorly
 Android applications where I do native apps in java 
 and Kotlin. 
 Don't forget am available for hire but majorly remote
 since am still in school
 Reach me out on samjay0.254@gmail.com. 
Check out my github account Username:Samjay0 "
